articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Oguk Co-op Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Oguk Co-op Farm
Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Oguk Co-op Farm in Anak County.
					 He went round the monument to the on-the-spot instructions given by President Kim Il Sung, the monument to his on-the-spot guidance and the room for the education in the revolutionary history.
					
					 After looking round the historic relics and mementoes displayed there with deep emotion, he said that Oguk-ri where once only backwardness and poverty prevailed has turned into a well known granary and a land of bliss good to work and live in thanks to the benevolence of Kim Il Sung, adding that his undying revolutionary exploits would always shine in the history of the country. 
					
					 He went round different places of the farm to see crops of various species produced by the farm. He acquainted himself in detail with the farming this year.
					
					 He appreciated the efforts made by the farmers there, expressing satisfaction over the fact that they effectively did farming, overfulfilling this year's plan for grain production. 
					
					 Noting that the farm holds an important share in grain production, he set forth important tasks to be fulfilled by the farm.
					
					 In order for the farm to increase grain production next year it is necessary to make substantial preparations for farming from now, he said, indicating the orientation and ways to do so one by one.
					
					 He showed such profound loving care as personally solving knotty problems facing the farm.
					
					He commanded a bird's-eye-view of Oguk-ri situated in the middle of the Orori Plain.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the picturesque Oguk Village has turned into an earthly paradise, a socialist fairyland in the era of the Workers' Party.
					
					 The three revolutions,  ideological, technical and cultural, have made rapid progress in the countryside and assistance to the rural areas and the state guidance and assistance to the coop farms have been increased, bringing about a new turn in the agricultural production, he said, adding that this is a striking demonstration of the validity and great vitality of the theses on the socialist rural question put forward by Kim Il Sung and the advantageous socialist rural economy system in the country.
					
					 The drive for rural construction is a noble and glorious one to turn the nation's countryside into a rich and cultured socialist countryside based on modern technology, he noted, stressing the need to continue channeling great efforts into this work.
					
					 He called on the whole country and all the people to continue concentrating all efforts on farming to bring about a radical turn in the agricultural production as the agricultural front is the most important and major front for settling the people's problems of clothing, food and housing.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, and Pak Nam Gi and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Chinese Defence Minister Returns Home
articles.content:
Chinese Defence Minister Returns Home
Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Col. General Liang Guanglie, minister of National Defense who doubles as a state councilor of the People's Republic of China, flew back home Thursday.
					Leaving with him were Col. General Huang Xianzhong, political commissar of the Shenyang Military Area of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, Lieu. General Feng Zhaoju, deputy commander of the Jinan Military Area, Vice Admiral  Xu Hongmeng, deputy commander of the Nanjing Military Area and commander of the East Sea Fleet of the Navy, Lieu. General Jiang Jianzeng, deputy commander of the Nanjing Military Area and commander of the Air Force of the area, Maj. General Chai Shaoliang, organizational director of the General Political Department of the CPLA, Maj. General Wang Jin, vice-director of the Operation Department of the General Staff, Maj. General Jia Xiaoning, deputy director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Ministry of National Defense, and other suite members.
					
					During their stay in the DPRK the minister and his party visited Mangyongdae and the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture Thursday to mark the 20th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Further Improving Labor Administration".
					Present there were Kim Yong Il, premier of the Cabinet, O Su Yong and Pak Su Gil, vice-premiers of the Cabinet, leading officials of the working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and officials in the field of labor administration in Pyongyang and local areas. 
					
					The work published on November 27, Juche 78 (1989) fully systematizes the Juche-oriented idea and theory on socialist labor administration and clearly indicates tasks and ways for improving the labor administration as required by the developing reality. 
					
					O Su Yong in a report delivered at the meeting said the work serves as an immortal great programme for the socialist labor administration run through with the Juche-oriented principles and ways as it scientifically clarified principled issues arising in establishing a revolutionary habit of working  throughout the society, making an effective use of  manpower resources, properly enforcing a socialist system for paying for the work done and fully providing the working people with working conditions. 
					
					Recalling that Kim Jong Il made sure that the above-said system was properly enforced and the working people were provided with good conditions for a material life and cultural rest, the reporter noted that his wise leadership and warm care made it possible to give full play to the advantages of the socialist labor system and improve the cultural and emotional life of the Korean people.
					
					He referred to the fact that over the past two decades the validity and vitality of the socialist labor law and the party's policy on labor have been demonstrated and great progress has been made in the labor administration.
					
					He called for more successfully enforcing such popular policies as the social insurance system, recuperation and relaxation systems and premium system for honored disabled soldiers, abiding by the principle of collectivism in the labor administration and steadily improving the system and ways of labor administration.

articles.title: Film Show Marks Romania's National Day
articles.content:
Film Show Marks Romania's National Day
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- A film show took place at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Thursday on the occasion of the national day of Romania.
					 Present there were Ryu Sung Rim, vice-chairman of the DPRK-Romania Friendship Association, officials concerned and working people in the city, Iancu Liviu Ovidiu, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Romanian embassy here, and its other officials.
					
					 The participants watched a Romania and France co-produced film.

articles.title: Chilsong Gate
articles.content:
Chilsong Gate
Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The Chilsong Gate in Mt. Kumsu in Central District, Pyongyang City is the north gate of the inner fort in the Walled City of Pyongyang, which was erected in the middle of the 6th century during the period of Koguryo.
					The gate was repaired in the period of Koryo and reconstructed in 1711 and 1764.
					
					It was named Chilsong Gate after the Great Bear.
					
					The gate consists of the embankment linked with the walls and the gatehouse on top of it.
					
					The front side of the walls on the left and right of the gate protrudes as walls for reinforcement. 
					
					The embankment was piled up with trimmed stones through which there is an arch gate.
					
					There are a battlement and the gatehouse on the embankment.
					
					The gatehouse with single gable eaves is 7.38 meters in front and 4.36 meters in the flank. It has wooden floor in the middle of the room.
					
					The building is painted red and blue, adding gracefulness to it.
					
					The gatehouse is small in scale and simple in structure but is well harmonized with the complex structure at its bottom. 
					
					The gate is associated with the history of the Korean people who courageously fought against foreign invaders.

articles.title: Mass Movement Promoting Revolution and Construction
articles.content:
Mass Movement Promoting Revolution and Construction
Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The Three-revolution Red Flag Movement, a nation-wide mass one in the DPRK serves as a powerful driving force in the drive to build a great, prosperous and powerful socialist country.
					The Workers' Party of Korea initiated the movement in November of Juche 64 (1975), a historical period when the transformation of the whole society after the Juche idea came to the fore and has increased the nation's might, political, military and economic, in every way by deepening it as required by the developing reality in the DPRK.
					
					The history of the DPRK is permeated with the undying feats of the Korean people who have pushed ahead with the revolution and construction through mass movements including the Three-revolution Red Flag Movement, rallied around the Party and the leader in one mind.
					
					After the liberation of the country the Korean people under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung turned out in the general ideological mobilization movement for building the country, emulation drive for increased production and campaign against illiteracy. As a result the production was rapidly increased in industry and agriculture and illiteracy abolished for the first time in the east and the political, economic and cultural foundations of the young DPRK were cemented.
					
					In the post-war rehabilitation and construction period, too, the working people daringly waged a collective innovation movement for brining about a great upsurge in the socialist construction. Through the movement they turned out 120,000 tons of rolled steel at the blooming mill with a capacity of 60,000 tons, completed the 80-odd kilometers-long Haeju-Hasong railway project within 75 days and created the "Pyongyang Speed" by building dwelling houses for 20,000 families with materials, fund and manpower for 7,000 families, thus demonstrating the spirit of heroic Korea. 
					
					It is unthinkable apart from the might of the Three-revolution Red Flag Movement that the Korean people ushered in a great heyday of the WPK era in the socialist construction in the 1970s and 1980s and won proud victories and successes in the struggle for defending socialism and in the efforts for building a thriving nation under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il in the 1990s and 2000s.
					
					 Through the movement which has developed in depth in the new century the entire people have been armed with the Songun idea, the material and technological foundation of the national economy has been consolidated and the revolutionary soldier culture, a new one in the Songun era, has prevailed all over the country.
					
					 The present reality clearly proves that the mass movement of the working people who are equipped with the revolutionary idea and united around their great leader is the most powerful weapon for developing the society.

articles.title: S. Korean Youth and Students Organization Issues Statement
articles.content:
S. Korean Youth and Students Organization Issues Statement
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea issued a statement on Nov. 21 on the occasion of the 7th anniversary of its formation.
					Noting that the organization has waged a relentless struggle for the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration since its formation, the statement said these patriotic activities for reunification injected fresh energy into the movement of the youth and students.
					
					Nothing can stand in the way of the solidarity which enshrines the above-said declaration as its firm faith, it said, adding:
					
					The youth and students should prioritize the wishes of the people and devote all their efforts to realizing them. 
					
					The solidarity will carve out a new history of the movement of the youth and students under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration in the future, too.

articles.title: Lectures Given in Guinea
articles.content:
Lectures Given in Guinea
Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given at the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea and the National Museum of Guinea on Nov. 18 and 19 on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					Abdoulaye Diallo, chairman of the society, said in the lecture that the Korean people's holding 
						Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the supreme commander of their revolutionary armed forces marked an event to be specially recorded in the history of the KPA's development. 
					
					 Under the supreme commandership of Kim Jong Il the KPA has demonstrated its might as a matchless army fully prepared in military technique and grown to be steel-strong combat ranks all members of which are united close as one, he noted. 
					
					Riyad Chaloub, chief of the Guinean Group for the Study of February 16 Art, said in the lecture that Kim Jong Il enjoys absolute trust and respect from all the servicepersons of the KPA.
					
					The relationship between the supreme commander and the servicepersons in the DPRK is not a simple one of order and obedience but the one based on revolutionary comradeship in which they share idea, will and feelings and the servicepersons of the KPA are filled with the will to unhesitatingly dedicate even their lives to the supreme commander and devotedly carry through his orders and instructions, he noted, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's extraordinary wisdom, strategy and tactics and his profound love and deep trust in the servicepersons completely fascinated them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il se reune con ministro de Defensa de China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il se reune con ministro de Defensa de China
Pyongyang, 26 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recibio el dia 25 al coronel general Liang Guanglie, consejero de Estado y ministro de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular China, y su comitiva, de visita en Corea.
					En la ocasion, el huesped chino transmitio cortesmente al Dirigente el saludo de parte de Hu Jintao, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China y de la Comision Militar Central de la RPCh.
					
					Tras expresar agradecimiento por el respecto y reciprocar el saludo al presidente chino, el Dirigente departio con el huesped en un ambiente cordial y amistoso.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el primer vicecanciller Kang Sok Ju por la parte coreana y por la china, el embajador Liu Xiaoming y el agregado militar Sun Yanfeng de la embajada china en Corea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno granja cooperativa de Oguk
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno granja cooperativa de Oguk
Pyongyang, 26 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Granja Cooperativa de Oguk del distrito de Anak.
					El Dirigente recorrio el letrero con ensenanzas dadas en el terreno por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, el monumento en memoria de la visita de orientacion de el y la sala de educacion en la actividad historico-revolucionaria.
					
					Viendo con profunda emocion los objetos y datos historicos expuestos, dijo que gracias al Presidente, la comuna de Oguk, en que solo se reinaban el atraso y la pobreza en el pasado, se ha convertido en un granero famoso y en un paraiso terrenal confortable para trabajar y vivir y agrego que las hazanas revolucionarias inmortales del Presidente brillaran eternamente en los anales de la patria.
					
					Tras recorrer varios lugares de la granja, el Dirigente se entero detalladamente del estado de faenas agricolas para este ano examinando varias plantas agricolas producidas en ella.
					
					Se mostro satisfecho de que los granjeros hayan sobrecumplido el plan de produccion de granos para este ano al cultivar la tierra con mucho esmero y evaluo altamente los esfuerzos de ellos. 
					
					 El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan ante la Granja Cooperativa de Oguk senalando que esta ocupa la importante porcion en la produccion de cereales.
					
					 Senalo que es importante hacer bien los preparativos para la varada desde ahora a fin de producir en el proximo ano la gran cantidad de cereales en la granja e indico uno por otro la orientacion y medios para el particular.
					
					 Resolvio los problemas pendientes en esta granja.
					
					 Contemplo el panorama de la comuna de Oguk situada en el pleno centro de la llanura Orori.
					
					 Expreso gran satisfaccion de que la aldea de Oguk como un cuadro se ha convertido en un paraiso con paisaje maravilloso socialista de la epoca del PTC.
					
					 El Dirigente dijo que ahora se impulsan energicamente en el campo las tres revoluciones ideologica, tecnica y cultural y se intensifican el apoyo al campo rural, la direccion y la ayuda del Estado a las granjas cooperativas, gracias a lo cual se produce un nuevo viraje en la produccion agricola y agrego que esto sirve de una manifestacion fehaciente de la justeza e inagotable vitalidad de las tesis sobre el problema rural socialista presentadas por el Presidente y el ventajoso sistema de la economia rural socialista de nuestro pais. 
					
					Destaco que la lucha por la construccion rural deviene la noble y gloriosa labor para convertir nuestro campo rural en el rico y cultural socialista con la tecnologia moderna y subrayo que hay que seguir prestando gran fuerza a esta labor.
					
					Apunto que todo el pais y todo el pueblo tienen que seguir concentrando todas las fuerzas en la agricultura para registrar un viraje trascendental en la produccion agricola puesto que el frente agricola es el mas importante para solucionar el problema de vestido, alimento y la vivienda de los habitantes.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario Kim Ki Nam y los jefes de departamento Pak Nam Gi y Jang Song Thaek, del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Resolucion conjunta de la APRP
articles.content:
Resolucion conjunta de la APRP
Pyongyang, 26 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 19o aniversario de la constitucion de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP), quedo publicada el dia 20 en el Norte, el Sur de Corea y en ultramar una resolucion conjunta.
					La APRP vino poniendose siempre al frente del movimiento por la reunificacion de los connacionales para mantener los 3 Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria: la independencia, la reunificacion pacifica y la gran unidad nacional y las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur y ejecutarlos, senala la nota y continua:
					
					La APRP mantendra y ejecutara cabalmente las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur para defender la paz del pais y abrir nueva fase de la reunificacion independiente, promovera mas la reconciliacion y cooperacion nacionales y fortalecera mas la solidaridad y la unidad con todas las fuerzas patrioticas internas y externas por la reunificacion.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, desarrollara la solidaridad organica y la lucha conjunta con el Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio y elevara la vigilancia  sobre las astutas maquinaciones de division y cizana de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion contra las fuerzas patrioticas por la reunificacion.
					
					Y rechazara cabalmente a todas las teorias de confrontacion inclusive la "desnuclearizacion, apertura y 3000 dolares" que niegan las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur, atentan el sistema y la dignidad de su contraparte y prosiguen la confrontacion fratricida y frenara rotundamente a todas las maniobras conjuntas militares y maquinaciones belicas que se libran junto con las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					Luchara hasta el fin por abolir las malignas leyes anti-reunificacion y anti-nacion como la "Ley de seguridad" y la muralla institucional, realizar la legalizacion de la sede de la parte surena de la APRP y excarcelar a todas las personalidades patrioticas por la reunificacion arrestadas injustamente.
					
					La APRP ampliara y fortalecera las redes de su organizacion y realizara mas solidamente la solidaridad tripartita del Norte, el Sur y el ultramar.
					
					El ano que viene, es el significativo en que se celebraran el 10o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y el 20o aniversario de la constitucion de la APRP. Esta organizacion hara del 2010 el ano de la victoria orgullosa para desarrollar el movimiento de la APRP y abrir nueva fase trascendental de la unidad nacional y la reunificacion independiente bajo la bandera de las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur.

articles.title: Acto por la publicacion de obra de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Acto  por la publicacion de obra de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 26 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 26 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto dedicado al 20o aniversario de la publicacion de la obra maestra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "Para mejorar y fortalecer aun mas la labor de administracion del trabajo", publicada el 27 de noviembre de 78 (1989) de la Era Juche.
					En la ocasion participaron el primer ministro Kim Yong Il y los vicepremieres O Su Yong y Pak Su Gil, del Consejo de Ministros, los funcionarios directivos de las organizaciones de trabajadores, ministerios, organos centrales, los funcionarios de administracion del trabajo de la capital y las provincias. 
					
					Esta obra sistematiza globalmente la idea y teoria sobre la administracion del trabajo socialista del Juche y aclara las tareas y medios para mejorar y fortalecer la labor de administracion del trabajo conforme a la realidad en desarrollo. 
					
					En su informe O Su Yong subrayo que la obra dilucido cientificamente los problemas de principios que se presentan en establecer el estilo de vida laboral revolucionario en toda la sociedad, utilizar eficazmente los recursos de mano de obra, ejecutar correctamente el sistema de pago de trabajo socialista y asegurar suficientemente las condiciones de vida laboral de los trabajadores y asi ella es el gran programa inmortal de la administracion del trabajo socialista penetrado del principio y metodo del Juche.
					
					Prosiguio que gracias a la sabia direccion y el cuidado cordial del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien hizo aplicar correctamente el sistema de pago del trabajo socialista y ofrecer a los trabajadores las excelentes condiciones materiales y culturales y de descanso se puso de pleno manifiesto la superioridad del regimen de trabajo socialista y fue posible mejorarse mas la vida cultural del pueblo.
					
					Durante 20 anos pasados se manifestaron la justicia y vitalidad de la ley del trabajo socialista y la politica de trabajo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y se logro el gran avance en la labor de administracion del trabajo, se refirio.
					
					Subrayo la necesidad de ejecutar mas bien las medidas populares como los sistemas del seguro social, de reposo y recuperacion y de beneficio de ex militar minusvalido, materializar el principio colectivista en la labor de administracion del trabajo y de mejorar sin cesar el sistema y metodo de esta labor.
